name: HSC Marketing
description:
HSC Marketing is a boutique agency by design. Like a memorable morsel, our size allows us to provide our clients with an experience that makes a lasting impression. Our hallmarks are personalized service, strategic vision, imagination and attention to detail. We have a team of top-notch marketing, public relations and advertising professionals who are committed to exceeding your company’s expectations. 
Clients
Starbucks Coffee. Baylor Health Care System. Richardson Regional, now Methodist Richardson Medical Center. Methodist Health System. Heart Hospital of Austin.  And more. We are proud of our history of long-term client relationships. We think it speaks to our commitment to personal service, dedication to results and attention to detail. 
Services
Strategic planning, market research, internal communications, corporate communications, competitive analysis, advertising, branding, media planning and buying (traditional, interactive and social), design, copywriting, production, photography, printing, fulfillment, direct mail, public relations, media training, white papers, improving the customer experience.
